I'm not sure Wicca is a relgion that is "protected" under the US Constitution...
 
 Does anyone know for sure? Looking for proof, not just an opinion.

post_info.post_title: Is Wicca Recognized As a Religion by USA?

Going back to my witchy days :) I do believe it is now recognized...
 I will have to look it up to provide proof though.

It must be, it's a pretty big religion. Anyway it defiantly is over here, I'm sure it would be there too. Hell if Jedi can make it...
 
 http://www.statistics.gov.uk/census2001/pdfs/section5part3.pdf
 
 It's on p18.

If I am not mistaken there is Wicca and then there is Wicca religion. Wicca alone is not (or they do not) consider(ed) a religion since it is purely earth-based or only relies on things that are natural, things that can be seen and proven.
 
 The Wicca religion on the other hand believes in the supernatural, the calling of spirits and using spells - witchcraft, etc.
 
 That may have changed and they could be one in the same now.
